name: Waystation 43
description:
You are a ExploreCorp detective sent to investigate why Waystation 43 went dark.

Very short, hopefully simple. My second attempt at a (hopefully) functioning IF game, and first project with Gruescript.

Made for Fortnightly Fiction Jam 17 with Gruescript: https://versificator.itch.io/gruescript

Cover image credit to Norbert Kowalczyk: https://unsplash.com/photos/PQHOmT-vkgA
